# [Interview #826: Mistborn: The Final Empire Annotations, Entry #131](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=826#131)

#### Brandon Sanderson

Kelsier standing and Rioting against the Lord Ruler's Soothing is supposed to kind of be a symbolic foreshadowing of the day when the two of them will stand across from one another in a similar city squareâ€”one impossibly powerful, the other just impossibly stubborn.
